title: Clair de Terre = Earth Light
brief_description:
Pierre lives alone with his father in Le Marais district of Paris. He constantly thinks of Tunisia where his mother died when he was only five years old. He finally manages to travel accross to the country of his birth and meets Madame Lariviere, a former friend of the family.

Credits: Director, Guy Gilles ; writers, Guy Gilles ; photography, Guy Gilles, Philippe Rousselot ; music, Jean-Pierre Stora.
Cast: Edwige Feuillere, Annie Girardot, Patrick Jouanne, Roger Hanin, Micheline Presle, Elina Labourdette.
